title: pascalmwin.github.io
text:
This is a Quarto website.
To learn more about Quarto websites visit https://quarto.org/docs/websites. Hello, my name is Pascal Mwin. I am a medical doctor and epidemiologist with experience in noncommunicable disease prevention and control. I created this website as part of my UBC MDS coursework to showcase my work and interests in data science, global health, and digital health innovations.

title: About Me
text:
Hi, Iâ€™m Pascal
I am a medical doctor and public health professional currently studying Data Science at UBC.
My interests include global health, non-communicable diseases, and the use of data-driven methods to improve health systems.
In my free time, I enjoy running and exploring new ideas in digital health and epidemiology.
